jobDescription: Job CategorySales  Job Details  Marketing Analytics team at Salesforce provides actionable, timely intelligence to support marketing and sales efforts at Salesforce. The Senior Data Analyst role reports to Marketing Data Scientist, and works closely with other Data Science and Data Analytics teams. Responsibilities:Build data analysis products using Salesforce internal and external datasets.Visualize data for dashboards and reports.Collect data from various source systems using FTP, SQL and other relevant technologies.Perform basic statistical analysis using descriptive measures such as central tendency, dispersion and skewness.Communicate analytics findings to the stakeholders in written and spoken format.Perform data formatting as required to join data from different sources.Prepare data for analysis by duplicate/missing data detection. Classify and store datasets for future use.Become expert in the tools and data sources supporting Marketing Analytics and Reporting.Be willing to take on analysis tasks with progressively increasing complexity.Experience:Motivated self-starter able to work independently and with ability to keep up in a fast-paced environment.Bachelor's degree in Business Administration or Data Analytics / Statistics, Master's degree a plus.Understanding of data visualization principles, basic statistics and iterative data analysis.Comfortable with different computer operating systems.Some experience with, and willing to learn more about relational databases such as Oracle, MySQL or SQL Server.Data manipulation, reporting and visualization tools, such as Business Objects, MS Excel, Google Sheets.Experience with Salesforce products a plus.
